bibl.title: Letter from William G. Harrison to Emilie Lawrence Reed, September 10, 1929

div1.p: Harrison thanks Emilie Lawrence Reed for the gift of a Bible.

div1.head: Letter from William G. Harrison to Emilie Lawrence Reed, September 10, 1929
div1.opener:
Dr. W. G. Harrison
901-409 EMPIRE BUILDING
HOURS 12 A. M. TO 4 P. M. EXCEPTING SUNDAYS
OTHER HOURS BY APPOINTMENT
Birmingham, Sep. 10. 29
My dear Mrs. Reed:
div1.p:
How gracious of you to send us the
Bible. I've already written to our Registry
that is placed in vault till I come &
shall place your letter with it. Through many
many years it will stimulate & inspire students
to strive for a noble life -- to think beyond the
financial return -- to seek after the
highest things. I earnestly hope your future &
that of your Daughters may find daily joy in
the assurance you help to make Dr.
Reeds memory a benedictin to others, also
